info.author: Versile AS
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
VDI Generator
-------------

VDI Generator is a simple program for generating a Versile Decentral
Identity from identity secret data. VDI-based identities enables
generating RSA keypairs from secret keydata. For more information
about Versile Decentral Identity see `reference material
<https://versile.com/doc/platform/current/vdi/>`__ for Versile
Platform. VDI Generator can be obtained `here
<https://versile.com/products/vpy/tools/>`__\ .

Dependencies
------------

This program requires `Versile Python
<http://versile.com/products/vpy/>`__\ , the `PySide
<http://www.pyside.org/>`__ Qt bindings, and `Qt
<http://qt.nokia.com/>`__ to run.
info.name: vdi-generator
info.html_description:
VDI Generator

VDI Generator is a simple program for generating a Versile Decentral Identity from identity secret data. VDI-based identities enables generating RSA keypairs from secret keydata. For more information about Versile Decentral Identity see reference material for Versile Platform. VDI Generator can be obtained here.

Dependencies

This program requires Versile Python, the PySide Qt bindings, and Qt to run.
